marketplaces.name: superclaude-dev
marketplaces.description: [DEV] Unlocks the full potential of Claude with a suite of powerful tools and integrations. Superclaude enhances your experience by providing seamless access to external services, advanced data processing capabilities, and customizable workflows. Whether you're looking to automate tasks, integrate with APIs, or extend Claude's functionality, Superclaude has you covered.
